hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$9{:}25$ is $25$ minutes after $9{:}00$. 

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 9:00 and 60 is labeled 10:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. The label 9:25 is at the fifth mark to the right of 20.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6335de20ae99d84da915ffd2af21386b8f59b36f) 

So, we move $25$ tick marks past $9{:}00$.

This number line shows $9{:}25$ graphed:

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 9:00 and 60 is labeled 10:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. Point B is labeled at the fifth mark to the right of 20.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d5536b0396a5ca5111ea3db25a61a7fb7abea2a6)

question.content:
**On which number line is $9{:}25$ graphed?**
